content: feather and fan short scarf a short scarf good for layering under the collar of your jacket to keep your neck warm yarn 1 skein malabrigo yarn lace 430 meters pattern shown used approximately 300 meters needle 5 0mm us 8 size 15 x 31 or to desired length k=knit k2tog = knit two together yo = yarn over cast on 76 stitches row 1 k2 k2tog x 3 yo k1 x 6 k2tog x 6 x3 yo k1 x 6 k2tog x 3 k2 row 2 purl row 3 knit row 4 purl repeat row to desired length and cast off weave in ends soak in tepid water and block © 2009 kelly faller ravelry firefly blog www fireflyknit blogspot com
